title: `debug_trace*` requires `tracerConfig` to be set
body:
### üêõ Bug Report
Hi team!
Seems that there is a bug either in docs or in implementation.
In [docs](https://era.zksync.io/docs/api/api.html#debug-traceblockbynumber) `tracerConfig` described as optional argument, but when I actually query the public rpc or my NaaS provider nodes I receive the error `missing field `tracerConfig` at line 1 column 24`


```sh
$ curl --location 'https://mainnet.era.zksync.io' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0",
	"id":1,
	"method":"debug_traceBlockByNumber",
	"params":["0x11a8bf6",{"tracer": "callTracer"}]
}'
# Response
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "error": {
        "code": -32602,
        "message": "Invalid params",
        "data": "missing field `tracerConfig` at line 1 column 24"
    },
    "id": 1
}
```

However setting the `tracerConfig` fixes the problem, but it's wrong documented behaviour.

```sh
$ curl --location 'https://mainnet.era.zksync.io' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0",
	"id":1,
	"method":"debug_traceBlockByNumber",
	"params":["0x11a8bf6",{"tracer": "callTracer", "tracerConfig": { "onlyTopCall": false }}]
}'

{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "result": [
        {
            "result": {
                "type": "Call",
                "from": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
                "to": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000008001",
                "gas": "0x8b14b",
                "gasUsed": "0x51b39",
                "value": "0x0",
                "output": "0x",
                "input": "0x095ea7b3000000000000000000000000be7d1fd1f6748bbdefc4fbacafbb11c6fc506d1d0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001312d00",
                "error": null,
                "revertReason": null,
                "calls": ...
}
```
